programme.title: One World
programme.desc: Zain Asher and Bianna Golodryga cover the top global and national issues of the day.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane Amanpour provides her powerful interview skills and provocative analysis on global stories that matter to you.

programme.title: Isa Soares Tonight
programme.desc: Isa Soares deep dives into today's top stories with insightful conversations and reports from around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight With Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech: Europe
programme.desc: Spotlighting the biggest names and key trends shaping the European technology ecosystem. Hosted by Tom Mackenzie in London.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Leaders With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Francine visits Finland, where the threat from Russia looms large. She speaks to President Alexander Stubb about Finnish resilience and how his country is preparing for an uncertain future.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the day's top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Idea Generation
programme.desc: Ideas are the global currency of the 21st century. But how do you come up with, execute, and operationalise one? The answers are what separates successful creative influences from everyone else.

programme.title: Emma Barnett Meets...
programme.desc: In a series of one to one interviews award-winning journalist Emma Barnett meets leaders in their fields who are advancing and reshaping the global debate.

programme.title: Planet Carnivore: Perfect Killers
programme.desc: Great White sharks, polar bears, lions and brown bears battle rivals and the elements to maintain their positions at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close With Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the ocean‚Äôs most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. It‚Äôs highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Sharks Of The North
programme.desc: Sightings of great white sharks have been on the rise in Atlantic Canada. Alanna Canaran, a passionate science educator and dive instructor, embarks on a mission to unravel the enigmas surrounding these magnificent creatures and is determined to dispel fear of sharks in Nova Scotians. As the journey unfolds, Canaran and her team dive into the history of human-shark relationships along the coast.

programme.title: World's Biggest Tiger Shark?
programme.desc: Marine biologist, Kori Garza and underwater cameraman, Andy Casagrande are in French Polynesia and on the trail of Kamakai, a huge female Tiger shark first seen by Kori six months ago on a research dive. .

programme.title: Planet Carnivore: Perfect Killers
programme.desc: Great White sharks, polar bears, lions and brown bears battle rivals and the elements to maintain their positions at the top of the food chain.

programme.title: Return Of The Predators
programme.desc: After 30 years of war and destruction, Gorongosa National Park in Mozambique has undergone a remarkable restoration. Herbivores once again bound across the plains, but hunters have been slower to return, leaving the park out of balance..until now!.

programme.title: Killer Animal Tactics
programme.desc: From top predators to clever creatures, these killers are some of the most armed and dangerous animals in the world. In order to survive, they use some of the scariest strategies and lethal weapons like ambush, camouflage, claws and paws, venom, pack hunting and more to take down prey. The name of the game is kill or be killed!.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol performs emergency surgery on a dog that swallowed a rope toy. Dr. Nicole examines a tiny kitten with a big eye problem, and Dr. Lisa helps a horse suffering from heaves. A fungal infection glows on a Pomeranian while a lump grows on a Pitbull. The Pols celebrate their 55th wedding anniversary with cake decorated by grandkids, Silas and Abigail.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol treats three bovines and one tiny rabbit before heading to the Netherlands with Diane to celebrate his 80th birthday. Just because the Docs away, it doesnt mean that the clinic slows down. A very vocal pig needs surgery to treat a hernia, a blocked cat is in pain and requires immediate relief, and a puppy is feeling the effects of eating something inedible. .

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees, Ryan reveals the steps to finding ‚Äúthe one,‚Äù underdog style. From first attraction in giant-nosed proboscis monkeys to the importance of wingmen in turkey courtship or even foreplay with flying foxes, these animals are rewriting the rule book on messy and complicated relationships in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds puts the spotlight on the underdogs who get ahead by dishonest means. From the master-of-disguise frogfish to a butt-biting jackal and a multiheaded caterpillar playing the decoy, they are the masters of deception and deceit. And bringing all these hustlers together is the greatest con artist of them all ‚Äì a cunning macaque who feeds on the spoils from unsuspecting tourists.
